node_id.name: node_id
node_id.description: The node ID of the node for which user wants to start the node maintainence.
node_id.validation_error_text: Parameter node_id only accepts integer numbers.

description.name: description
description.description: Brief description about the maintainence on the node.
description.validation_error_text: Parameter description only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: start_node
description: starts the node maintainence for a node
